languages.text: "Когда гротеск конкурирующего кабала вырвал мне плечо с рукой. Когда мне нужно было средство выдавить из тебя правду на Обсидиановом суде. Когда у меня возникали личные пожелания, удовлетворить которые мог только мастер плоти".

"When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."
languages.original_text: "Когда гротеск конкурирующего кабала вырвал мне плечо с рукой. Когда мне нужно было средство выдавить из тебя правду на Обсидиановом суде. Когда у меня возникали личные пожелания, удовлетворить которые мог только мастер плоти".

traits.locale_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando el Grotesco de una Kábala rival me arrancó el brazo de cuajo. Cuando necesité una sustancia para extraerte la verdad en la Corte de Obsidiana. Cuando tenía deseos personales que solo un maestro de la carne podía satisfacer».
languages.original_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando el Grotesco de una Kábala rival me arrancó el brazo de cuajo. Cuando necesité una sustancia para extraerte la verdad en la Corte de Obsidiana. Cuando tenía deseos personales que solo un maestro de la carne podía satisfacer».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “当敌对阴谋团的怪诞把我的胳膊从肩膀上扯下来的时候；当我需要某种东西，让你在黑曜王庭说出真相的时候；当我的个人欲望只有血肉大师才能满足的时候。”
languages.original_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."

traits.locale_text: “当敌对阴谋团的怪诞把我的胳膊从肩膀上扯下来的时候；当我需要某种东西，让你在黑曜王庭说出真相的时候；当我的个人欲望只有血肉大师才能满足的时候。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ライバルの陰謀団のグロテスクが俺の腕の肩をもぎ取ったとき。オブシディア法廷ではお前から真実を絞り出すための物質が必要だったとき。血肉の達人にしか満たせない個人的な欲望があったときだ」
languages.original_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."

traits.locale_text: 「ライバルの陰謀団のグロテスクが俺の腕の肩をもぎ取ったとき。オブシディア法廷ではお前から真実を絞り出すための物質が必要だったとき。血肉の達人にしか満たせない個人的な欲望があったときだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Quand le grotesque d'une Kabale rivale m'a arraché le bras au niveau de l'épaule, mais aussi pour me procurer une substance permettant de vous arracher la vérité à la Cour d'Obsidienne et pour assouvir certains désirs intimes que seul un maître de la chair était en mesure de satisfaire. »
languages.original_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."

traits.locale_text: « Quand le grotesque d'une Kabale rivale m'a arraché le bras au niveau de l'épaule, mais aussi pour me procurer une substance permettant de vous arracher la vérité à la Cour d'Obsidienne et pour assouvir certains désirs intimes que seul un maître de la chair était en mesure de satisfaire. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Als die Groteske einer rivalisierenden Kabale mir den Arm an der Schulter ausgerissen hat. Als ich eine Substanz brauchte, um vor dem Obsidiangericht die Wahrheit aus Euch herauszuholen. Als ich persönliche Begierden hatte, die nur ein Meister des Fleischs befriedigen konnte."
languages.original_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."

traits.locale_text: "Als die Groteske einer rivalisierenden Kabale mir den Arm an der Schulter ausgerissen hat. Als ich eine Substanz brauchte, um vor dem Obsidiangericht die Wahrheit aus Euch herauszuholen. Als ich persönliche Begierden hatte, die nur ein Meister des Fleischs befriedigen konnte."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."

languages.text: "Rakip bir Kabal'ın Grotesk'i kolumu söküp aldığı zaman. Obsidiyen Divan'da hakikati senden söküp almaya kalktığım zaman. Yalnızca et üstadı birinin dindirebileceği, şahsi arzulara kapıldığım zaman."
languages.original_text: "When the Grotesque of a rival Kabal ripped my arm off at the shoulder. When I needed a substance to wring the truth out of you in the Obsidian Court. When I had personal desires that only a master of flesh could satisfy."

traits.locale_text: "Rakip bir Kabal'ın Grotesk'i, kolumu söküp aldığı zaman. Obsidiyen Divan'da hakikati senden söküp almaya kalktığım zaman. Yalnızca et üstadı birinin dindirebileceği, şahsi arzulara kapıldığım zaman."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
